sentences.english: FemaleBleb of recrudescent sex genital must make department of gynaecology check in order to divide cancer of husband palace neck.
sentences.chinese: 女性複發性生殖器皰疹須作婦科檢查以除外子宮頸癌。

sentences.english: AimTo observe the inhibitory effect of germanium ferulic acid on the tumor U_(14 ).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察阿魏酸鍺對小鼠子宮頸癌14號的作用。

sentences.english: Rarely, a surgical abortion can damage the cervix or uterus.
sentences.chinese: 手術墮胎很少會破壞子宮頸或者子宮。

sentences.english: Other types include kidney, bladder, pancreatic and cervical cancer.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些包括腎癌，胰腺癌和子宮頸癌。

sentences.english: The patient treated for carcinoma in situ of the cervix must receive adequate follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 曾接受子宮頸原位癌治療的患者必須接受足夠的隨診。

sentences.english: Polyps are an overgrowth of the tissue that lines the uterine cavity or cervix.
sentences.chinese: 息肉是子宮腔或子宮頸內膜過度增生的組織。

sentences.english: It appears that like cervical cancer, ano-rectal cancers have an infectious component and may be sexually transmitted.
sentences.chinese: 就像和子宮頸癌一樣，直腸癌也是一種性#傳播疾病。

sentences.english: Conclusion loop electrosurgical excision the procedure simplicity of operator, the complication are few.
sentences.chinese: 結論子宮頸環形電切術操作簡單，併發症少。

sentences.english: HPV is the cause of roughly 70 per cent of cervical cancers.
sentences.chinese: HPV則是大約百分之70患上子宮頸癌的原因。

sentences.english: One example cancer cause in faction of a cancer-causing infection is human veering , this .
sentences.chinese: 例如乳突淋瘤，這種病毒可能會引發女性的子宮頸癌。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find the ideal diagnosis and operation protocol of the cervical carcinoma in situ(CIS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討子宮頸原位癌合理的確診方法及處理方式。

sentences.english: Across Asia, a woman dies from cervical cancer every four minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲，每四分鐘有一名女性死於子宮頸癌。

sentences.english: Objective To study the ultrasound diagnostic value in huge cervical leiomyoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲對巨大子宮頸平滑肌瘤的診斷價值。
